mapper.select:
select t.*,t2.note as reqStatusNote, t92.opt_button as checkUserButton,t93.create_user_button as createUserButton, t92.role_code as checkRoleCode from t_pss_req t left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.req_status = t2.code and t2.type = 'xqdzt' left join t_pss_process_task t91 on t.process_id = t91.process_id left join t_pss_process t92 on t91.step = t92.step and t92.type = 'xqd' left join t_pss_status_button t93 on t93.`status` = t.req_status and t93.type ='xqdzt' where 1=1
order by t.id desc

select t.*,t2.note as reqStatusNote, t92.opt_button as checkUserButton,t93.create_user_button as createUserButton, t92.role_code as checkRoleCode from t_pss_req t left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.req_status = t2.code and t2.type = 'xqdzt' left join t_pss_process_task t91 on t.process_id = t91.process_id left join t_pss_process t92 on t91.step = t92.step and t92.type = 'xqd' left join t_pss_status_button t93 on t93.`status` = t.req_status and t93.type ='xqdzt' where 1=1
and t.id = #{id}

select t.*,t2.note as reqStatusNote, t92.opt_button as checkUserButton,t93.create_user_button as createUserButton, t92.role_code as checkRoleCode from t_pss_req t left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.req_status = t2.code and t2.type = 'xqdzt' left join t_pss_process_task t91 on t.process_id = t91.process_id left join t_pss_process t92 on t91.step = t92.step and t92.type = 'xqd' left join t_pss_status_button t93 on t93.`status` = t.req_status and t93.type ='xqdzt' where 1=1
and t.req_code = #{reqCode}
